data.title: Krishna Bora BEd College
data.text:
KRISHNA BORA B. ED. COLLEGE was established in 1996 by the educationists of Lanka. It is the sole teacher training institute of Hojai Sub-Division. It fulfills the need of Teacher Training of Nagaon Distrct, particularly Hojai Sub-Division and its neighboring Districts of Karbi Anglong and N.C. Hills. It has now become one of the premier institutes of the state. The college was started at Lanka High School and its name was Lanka B. Ed. College. Then after it was renamed as Krishna Bora B. Ed. College.

The college was shifted to its own building in the year 2000 located at L. P. Road, N. Area, Lanka. The distance of the college from National High Way is near about 1 k.m. and from Lanka Rly. Station is 1.5 k.m

The college has got permission from Gauhati Univesity in the year 1998. And N.O.C. from the Govt. of Assam in the year 2000 vide letter No. A(I)E 132/2000/46 dated Dispur, the 14th september,2000. The college has recognized by N.C.T.E. vide letter No. ERC/7-51 (ER 51.7.1/2004/3585(i) dt 8th Dec 2004.

The college has revised recognition for opening D. El. Ed. course from the academic session 2017-19 vide letter no. 238.5.7/NCTE/ERCAPP3228/D. El. Ed./2017/52514 date. 25.042017 for conducting the said course. The college has received affiliation from SCERT, Assam vide letter no. SCERT/Exam./D.El. Ed. /Affi./13/2017/479 dated 05.05.17.

The college has its own building consist of adequate number of class rooms, one multipurpose hall, Psychological cum Technological laboratory, Science laboratory, Art room, Boys common room, Girls’ common room and a well equipped library with necessary text books, reference books, journals, Magazines etc. The College offers facilities for games and sports, cultural activities and all other retaliated

The college has revised recognition for opening D. El. Ed. course from the academic session 2017-19 vide letter no. 238.5.7/NCTE/ERCAPP3228/D. El. Ed./2017/52514 date. 25.042017 for conducting the said course. The college has received affiliation from SCERT, Assam vide letter no. SCERT/Exam./D.El. Ed. /Affi./13/2017/479 dated 05.05.17.

The college has its own building consist of adequate number of class rooms, one multipurpose hall, Psychological cum Technological laboratory, Science laboratory, Art room, Boys common room, Girls’ common room and a well equipped library with necessary text books, reference books, journals, Magazines etc. The College offers facilities for games and sports, cultural activities and all other retaliated co-curricular activities.

The College has requisite number of competent and dedicated teachers’ in the teaching staff. From its beginning the College has shown good results every year, So The College attracting students’ from different parts of Country.

Submit Online Admission

PROCEDURE OF ADMISSION

1. Admission to the college is strictly on merit basis, and the admission procedure is formulated by Governing Body, Keeping in view the guidelines issued by the University from time to time. The decision of the college authority would be final in this regard.

2. Candidates seeking admission into the B.Ed Course have to appear and passed the entrance test conducted the Gauhati University .

3. Students can apply for admission to the college in the prescribed forms issued by the college office on payment of Rs. 500/- (five hundred) in cash.

4. The prescribed application forms duly filled in by candidates have to be submitted at the college office on or before the last date as notified in the Notice Board.
